  • Method Details

    • setupTable

      public void setupTable​(Player player, Client client)
      Called after table scene is displayed. Handles TabelModel creation and receives the client and player references.
      Parameters:
      player - reference to player object
      client - reference to client object

    • playerHits

      void playerHits​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Called when hit button is pressed. Notifies server, receives card and updates player hand
      Parameters:
      event - Called when button pressed

    • playerStands

      void playerStands​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Called when stand button pressed. Notifies server and turn ends so next turn message is waited on from server.
      Parameters:
      event -

    • getCurrentTurn

      public String getCurrentTurn()
      Returns who is current player.
      Returns:
      current player username

    • setActivePlayer

      public void setActivePlayer​(String username, boolean currentPlayer)
      Updates the active player display elements. If player playing is client player, buttons are displayed.
      Parameters:
      username - username of player
      currentPlayer - true if username is client's player

    • addCard

      public void addCard​(Card card)
      Adds card to card VBox panel.
      Parameters:
      card - card object to add

    • updateYourScoreLabel

      public void updateYourScoreLabel​(String score)
      Updates score displayed by your score label.
      Parameters:
      score - Score value

    • updatePlayerScoreLabel

      public void updatePlayerScoreLabel​(String score)
      Update player score displayed by player score label
      Parameters:
      score - Score value

    • clearDeck

      public void clearDeck()
      Clears the local card VBox panel deck.

    • displayAlert

      public void displayAlert​(String message)
      Display alert message at bottom of screen
      Parameters:
      message - message to display

    • hideAlert

      public void hideAlert()
      Hides the alert message

    • hideControls

      public void hideControls()
      Hides the client player controls. Called when active player is updated from this client's player.

    • recieveServerCard

      public void recieveServerCard​(ArgsParser args, Player player)
      Wait to receive card from server when called from another thread. Specifically when waiting on external players turn.
      Parameters:
      args - Args of card received
      player - player object receiving card
